<font size="2" color="red"><b><u>Additional Info</u></b></font>
<font size="1">Each VM can have a maximum of 2vCores
IPv6 only available in USA (select locations)
Plans are stackable
Plans are non refundable
There are no overages. Network is suspended when bandwidth is exhausted
You can launch an instance in any location available for your plan
Storage, RAM and bandwidth are scalable
All resources can be allocated to a single instance with the exception of vCores
Existing clients need to provide a new email in the notes section so the pools do not conflict with existing plans
Multiple pool buyers need to add additional emails per additional location purchased so pools do not clash
vCores are fair share and allocated 25% of a thread (One hour burst per day)
IO Abuse instances will be suspended
CPU abuse instances are throttled rather than suspended
Nested Virtualisation enabled on most nodes
A secondary storage (HDD, SSD or NVMe SSD) can be attached to most USA plans. Contact support to add it to an already created instance if needed. 


</font>
